tool_description: The Nederland License Plate Decoder API allows you to retrieve detailed information about vehicles by decoding their license plates. By providing a license plate number, this API offers access to a wide range of vehicle details, including the full vehicle name, hybrid class, fuel type, CO2 emissions (WLTP and NEDC), maximum speed, horsepower and other relevant data. With this API, you can easily gather comprehensive information about Nederland-registered vehicles based on their license plate ...
name: Nederland License Plate Decoder
title: Nederland License Plate Decoder

api_list.name: plate_number
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nederland-license-plate-decoder.p.rapidapi.com/nl/N832NJ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nederland-license-plate-decoder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nederland-license-plate-decoder.p.rapidapi.com/{language}/{plate_number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nederland-license-plate-decoder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
